name: calculator
description: My take on Free Code Camp's Build a JavaScript Calculator project.

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:css
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:js:watch & npm run build:html:watch & npm run build:css:watch
scripts.preserve: npm run build:watch & sleep 8; echo 'Hopefully done building...'
scripts.predeploy: npm test && npm run build && mkdir .tmp && mv dist/* .tmp && mkdir dist/calculator && mv .tmp/* dist/calculator

author: Matthew Feidt
